oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lonas. Henry Lonas home.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Henry Lonas home on Western Avenue, Knoxville, TN. It was used as a stage coach stop known as "Four-Mile House." It was built of hand made brick and was located on Western Avenue just east of New Gray Cemetery. The house was torn down in 1938. Submitted ID: 'Mellen House' --Kingston Pike at Forks of the River. Built 1835, torn down for Western Plaza Shopping Center. from "Historic Treasure Spots of Knox County, Tennessee."
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Houses;
